New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 50th ODI hundred, breaking Sachin Tendulkar's record
Key Match Events: Shami took seven wickets to help India win by 70 runs
Daryl Mitchell scored a blistering century for New Zealand
Pre-Game Insights: India was the favorite due to their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: India's captain Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai
Others: India's victory secured their place in the World Cup final
